slow-tour.title: A Glimpse Of Bhutan
slow-tour.tagline: Immerse yourself in Bhutan's rich cultural heritage
slow-tour.description: Discover the authentic soul of Bhutan through its vibrant villages, warm homestays, and timeless traditions. This thoughtfully designed 7-day journey takes you from the bustling streets of Thimphu to the serene valleys of Punakha and the sacred heights of Tiger's Nest, offering a genuine connection to the people, culture, and spirit of the Himalayas.

pricing.note: Based on double occupancy. Single supplement available at an additional cost of $240.

highlights: Explore ancient dzongs and fortresses in Paro, Thimphu, and Punakha
Stroll through lush valleys, rice terraces, and riverside trails
Experience local village life through an authentic homestay / farmhouse

itinerary.title: Arrival in Paro, Travel to Thimphu
itinerary.description: Arrive at Paro International Airport and drive to the capital city - Thimphu. Visit the Takin Preservation Centre and Sangaygang viewpoint for a scenic view of the Thimphu valley, if time permits. Enjoy a welcome dinner featuring traditional Bhutanese cuisine.

itinerary.title: Journey to Punakha Valley
itinerary.description: Begin the day with a visit to the towering Buddha Dordenma before traveling over the scenic Dochula Pass, where 108 chortens crown the mountain ridge. Continue to Punakha and take a gentle walk through Sopsokha village, past rice terraces and mustard fields, to reach the sacred Chimi Lhakhang Temple.

itinerary.title: Farm to Heart: Life in Punakha
itinerary.description: Spend the day embracing the simple rhythms of rural life in Punakha. Join your hosts in daily farm activities, from milking cows and tending to paddy fields to learning how to cook a traditional Bhutanese meal.

itinerary.title: Colors of Village Life in Punakha
itinerary.description: Go on a slow guided stroll through the villages and witness the rhythm of everyday life. In the afternoon, take part in a hands-on natural dyeing workshop where you'll learn how locals use plants and minerals to create vibrant colors.

itinerary.title: Discover Paro Town
itinerary.description: Travel from Punakha to Paro and enjoy a leisure day exploring the town's charming streets, traditional arts and crafts stores, and cozy local caf√©s.

itinerary.title: Tiger's Nest Adventure & Hot Stone Bath
itinerary.description: Rise early for the iconic hike to Tiger's Nest Monastery, perched dramatically on the cliffside. After descending, unwind with a soothing traditional hot stone bath.

itinerary.title: Farewell Bhutan
itinerary.description: After breakfast, transfer to Paro Airport for your departure, carrying unforgettable memories of Bhutan's culture, landscapes, and warm hospitality.

notIncluded: Tips for guide and driver (optional but appreciated)

bookingInfo.fitnessLevel: Moderate fitness required for hiking activities

mountain-biking.title: Bhutan Mountain Biking & Cultural Adventure
mountain-biking.tagline: Cycle through Bhutan's scenic valleys and cultural heartlands
mountain-biking.description: Pedal through Bhutan's breathtaking landscapes, from the lush Paro Valley to the serene Punakha Valley, while experiencing authentic village life and cultural highlights. This 8-day journey combines mountain biking adventure with immersive cultural encounters.

pricing.note: Based on double occupancy. Single supplement available at an additional cost of $240.

highlights: Cycle through Paro and Punakha Valleys with breathtaking views
Ride over scenic mountain passes - Chelela and Dochula Pass
Participate in village homestay and traditional cooking workshop
Experience Bhutanese culture, temples, and dzongs along the way
Professional cycling guide with support vehicle
Quality mountain bikes and safety gear provided

itinerary.title: Arrival in Paro & Bike Orientation
itinerary.description: Arrive at Paro International Airport and meet your cycling guide. Get fitted for your mountain bike and take a short test ride around Paro Valley to get familiar with your bike and surroundings. Enjoy a welcome dinner featuring traditional Bhutanese cuisine.

itinerary.title: Paro Valley Ride
itinerary.description: Warm-up ride through the scenic Paro Valley (~25km, ~300m elevation gain, 3-4 hours). Visit cultural landmarks including Paro Dzong and local temples, while soaking in panoramic views of the valley and surrounding mountains.

itinerary.title: Paro to Thimphu via Chele La Pass
itinerary.description: Cycle from Paro to Thimphu (~40km, ~1,700m ascent to Chele La Pass at 3,988m, ~1500m descent to Thimphu, 6-7 hours). Experience breathtaking Himalayan vistas on the ascent and a thrilling downhill ride to Thimphu.

itinerary.title: Thimphu to Punakha Ride
itinerary.description: Enjoy a scenic ride from Thimphu to Punakha (~35km, ~600m ascent to Dochula Pass, ~600m descent to Punakha, 5-6 hours). Pause at Dochula Pass for photos and panoramic views.

itinerary.title: Punakha Village Experience
itinerary.description: A restful day of authentic village immersion. Participate in farm activities and enjoy a hands-on cooking workshop, preparing a traditional Bhutanese dish with your host family.

itinerary.title: Return to Paro
itinerary.description: Travel by private vehicle from Punakha to Paro (~4 hours). Spend the afternoon relaxing at your boutique hotel and exploring Paro town at a leisurely pace.

itinerary.title: Tiger's Nest Hike
itinerary.description: Rise early for the legendary hike to Tiger's Nest Monastery (~10km round trip, ~900m elevation gain, 4-5 hours). After the hike, relax with an optional hot stone bath or a gentle stroll around Paro town.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: After breakfast, transfer to Paro Airport for your departure, carrying unforgettable memories of Bhutan's landscapes, culture, and cycling adventure.

included: Support vehicle and private transportation throughout
notIncluded: Tips for guide and driver (optional but appreciated)

bookingInfo.fitnessLevel: Advanced fitness level required for mountain biking and moderate fitness level required for hiking activities

relaxation-tour.title: Relaxation & Wellness Tour
relaxation-tour.tagline: Rejuvenate your mind, body and spirit
relaxation-tour.description: Unwind in Bhutan's tranquil environment with yoga, meditation, spa treatments, and gentle nature walks. Perfect for those seeking peace and renewal.

pricing.note: Based on double occupancy. Single supplement available at an additional cost of $240.

itinerary.title: Arrival and Welcome
itinerary.description: Arrive in Paro, transfer to Boutique Hotel in Thimphu. Welcome tea and orientation.

itinerary.title: Wellness Program Begins
itinerary.description: Morning yoga, afternoon meditation, mindful walk in nature.

itinerary.title: Mindfulness Day
itinerary.description: Early morning hike for sunrise, healthy cooking class, evening sound bath.

itinerary.title: Cultural Wellness
itinerary.description: Visit peaceful temples, blessing ceremony, guided meditation.

itinerary.title: Travel Day to Punakha
itinerary.description: Peaceful walk through rice terraces of Sopsokha Village, visit Chimi Lhakhang.

itinerary.title: Nature Immersion
itinerary.description: Gentle forest walk, riverside meditation, herbal hot stone bath.

itinerary.title: Travel To Paro
itinerary.description: Transfer to Boutique Hotel in Paro, spend a quiet evening exploring Paro town.

itinerary.title: Hike Day to Tigers Nest
itinerary.description: Hike to Tigers Nest, farewell ceremony.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Morning meditation, transfer to airport with renewed spirit.

included: Entrance fees to all sites mentioned
notIncluded: Tips for guide and driver (optional but appreciated)
